thread.section_title: Days Hotel London- Waterloo - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Brilliant
thread.title_full: Brilliant - Review of Days Hotel London- Waterloo, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Amy A
title: Brilliant
text: Really enjoyed my stay here. Close to Waterloo Train station only around a 5-10 minute walk. And easy to get into the tourist areas such as westminster and the london eye etc. Rooms very clean and comfortable. Tea coffe supplied in room with decent mugs. Staff helpful and friendly on desk. We were able to check in at 11am which was fantastic!
